table.SQL_SELECT_LIST:
set nocount on
declare @totalItem int, @totalPage int set @totalItem = ( select count(0) from WCMS_Shipping where 1=1 { AND Shipping_ID <o> @Search:Shipping_ID } { AND Shipping_Note <o> @Search:Shipping_Note } ) if (@pageSize < 1) set @pageSize = 10 set @totalPage = ceiling(@totalItem * 1.0 / @pageSize) if (@pageIndex < 1) set @pageIndex = 1 if (@pageIndex > @totalPage) set @pageIndex = @totalPage
select [Shipping_ID] ,(select Definition_Name from wcms_Definition where Definition_ID = Shipping_Type) as Shipping_Type ,(select State_Name from wcms_State where State_ID = Shipping_State) as Shipping_State ,(select County_Name from wcms_County where County_ID = Shipping_County) as Shipping_County ,replace(CONVERT(varchar, Shipping_Price, 1), '.00', '') as Shipping_Price ,Shipping_Note ,Shipping_A ,0 as [locked] from ( select top (@pageIndex * @pageSize) ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY {@Sort} {@Asc}) as [num] ,[Shipping_ID] ,Shipping_Type ,Shipping_State ,Shipping_County ,Shipping_Price ,Shipping_Note ,case when [Shipping_A] = 1 then 'checked' else '' end as [Shipping_A] from WCMS_Shipping where 1=1 { AND Shipping_ID <o> @Search:Shipping_ID } { AND Shipping_Note <o> @Search:Shipping_Note } ) tb where [num] between (@pageIndex - 1 ) * @pageSize + 1 and @pageIndex * @pageSize select @totalItem, @pageSize, @pageIndex
table.SQL_LOAD_EDIT: set nocount on select [Shipping_ID] ,Shipping_Type ,Shipping_State ,Shipping_County ,Shipping_Price ,Shipping_Note ,Shipping_Date ,Shipping_A from WCMS_Shipping where Shipping_ID = @editID
table.SQL_UPDATE_ACTIVE: Update WCMS_Shipping set [Shipping_A] = @active where Shipping_ID = @editID Select @editID
table.SQL_DELETE: set nocount on Delete WCMS_Shipping where Shipping_ID = @delID Select @@ROWCOUNT
